name: 2D survival sim Vo.1.2
description:
2d survival sim is an endless sumilator game where you can fight mobs and kill goats try and survive as much as you can.

NOTE: This is a early access version the full game is nowhere near finished.

Controls: wasd or arrow keys to move attack with space bar and eat meat with E key (it heals health)

LOG: 2021/09/11. released beta 0.1.2 of game.
